user_pass_text.en: Please enter your login details in the form below to access Code Enigma services.

help_header.en: Help! I don't remember my password.

help_text.en: Without your username and password you cannot authenticate yourself for access to the service. Please contact the Code Enigma support team.

error_nopassword.en: You sent something to the login page, but for some reason the password was not sent. Try again please.

change_home_org_text.en: You have chosen %HOMEORG% as your home organisation. If this is wrong you may choose another one.
